name: The Fading Light
description:
The Fading Light is a 2D top-down survival game with a large area where you have to survive from the weird creatures that tries to kill you in an endless chase

Main Features:

  • You have 3 powers and each one has its own properties
  • The light is fading over time so you have to take the white pickups to keep it lit
  • An ultimate power to kill all the surrounding enemies at once when available

Rules are simple:

  • Survive from the weird creatures  and don't let them get you
  • Keep the lighter lit
  • Take the pickups for ammo

The game is compatible with a PS4 controller (DualShock 4), it might work with other controllers but you may get a different button mapping

Note: The art style is inspired from Blackthornprod
